Name: Offering table
Description: Offering table, rectangular in shape, with an interior sunken basin and a channel at the lower end connected to it. Two hes-vases in high relief serve as decoration, from both of which streams of water appear to be flowing, spilling onto two rows, one above the other, of four loaves of bread each. There is an inscription in Meroitic on the borders, which unfortunately is almost totally lost due to the characteristics of the basic material (a very white stone).
